header.title: MoodleNet Platform
header.tagline: Open-source platform revolutionizing how educators discover and share educational resources worldwide, promoting open education and collaboration

overview.title: Project vision
overview.p1: MoodleNet transforms how educators discover, share, and curate educational resources. As a frontend developer, I contributed to building a comprehensive ecosystem for collaborative curation and discovery of high-quality educational content.
overview.p2: The platform addresses the need for accessible, well-curated educational materials while promoting open education and supporting the global teaching community.

discovery.title: Resource discovery
discovery.desc: Advanced search and filtering for educational resources across multiple formats

curation.title: Content curation
curation.desc: Collaborative curation tools for educators to organize and share resources

community.title: Community
community.desc: Social learning features and community-driven content sharing

quality.title: Quality control
quality.desc: Peer review and rating systems for educational content quality

learningPaths.title: Learning paths
learningPaths.desc: Structured learning sequences and curriculum planning tools

sharing.title: Open sharing
sharing.desc: Open licensing and sharing mechanisms for educational resources

main.title: Main interface
main.desc: Clean and intuitive main interface for discovering educational resources. Advanced search capabilities with multiple filter options.

details.title: Resource details
details.desc: Detailed resource view with metadata, ratings, and community feedback. Comprehensive information for educators to evaluate content.

community.title: Community features
community.desc: Community-driven features including reviews, ratings, and collaborative curation. Social learning elements for enhanced engagement.

future.title: Vision for the future
future.p1: MoodleNet is evolving into a comprehensive ecosystem for open education and resource sharing. Future plans include AI-powered content recommendations, advanced learning analytics, and partnerships with educational institutions worldwide to expand the platform's reach.
future.p2: The platform aims to become the global standard for educational resource discovery and curation, connecting educators with the world's best open educational resources and fostering collaborative learning communities.
